column1: QUESTIONS
Can I open AICTE web portal in any browser?
Where I can find information related to Approval Process 2018-19?
How can I get New User-id and password (login credentials) for Website
password?
I have forgotten the password for logging in AICTE Web Portal. What is the
procedure to recover this?
Is PAN No. field mandatory for 'Forgot Password' form?
When I try to login with Institute's Credentials, error message 'Invalid username
and password' is displayed. What should I do?
I am not able to find some tabs in New upgraded AICTE Web Portal
I am a diploma Institute and unable to enter details under Quality Education
Mandate Screen
How to delete old faculty details?
Is Aadhaar/PAN details mandatory to update faculty details in AICTE Web
Portal?
How to add re-joined faculty in AICTE Web Portal
I have made Online Payment but amount is not updated in portal.
I am not able to make payment because AICTE Website is not directing to
Payment Gateway
Who is Who button is not available in AICTE New Website.
Where to send the queries related to portal, payment and approval related issues
for the Academic Year 2018-19?
Our Institution was allotted a User ID for the approval process 2017-18 as a new
Institution. Some information was uploaded but the application could not be
submitted at that time. Now I want to know that the same User ID can be used for
approval process 2018-19
What we have to do in case we face server busy message?
We want to change details which are non-editable / read-only?
Whether Affidavit can be submitted in e-Stamp Paper?
We want to open new Management Institution and want approval for MBA and
PGDM Course in one time. Required land and infrastructure (according to AICTE
norms) are available and ready withthe Society. Please confirm whether we have
to pay ₹8Lakh TER Charges for both the Courses or have to pay ₹8Lakh TER
Charges Ansfor individual Course?
Is TER Charges refundable in case application for approval is rejected?
We have applied for New Programme (Engineering/Architecture/Management/
Pharmacy/HMCT/MCA/Arts and Crafts) with level UG/PG/Diploma as New
Institution in 2017-18. However, the same was rejected and we have received
Final LOR. Can we apply again for starting New Institution in the same name?
Can a new standalone Management Institution start PGDM 120 seats and MBA
120 seats at the same time if they satisfy all the requirements of AICTE?
What is the last date of submission of hard copy application at Regional Office for
the applications under Chapter I?
How the Mega and Metro Cities, Urban Area and Rural Area have been
determined?
I want to know whether any applicant of the organization can be the owner of the
land or else if any member of the organization can give a lease to the applicant
society. Moreover does the lease agreement needed to be registered or not.
I would like to convert from Diploma to Degree Level and vice-versa. What to do?
We have 5 Diploma Courses; Can we apply for conversion of Two Diploma
Courses only into Degree Courses?
We would like to apply for conversion of our UG Degree Courses, but we don’t
find the nomenclature of certain Courses in Annexure 4 A. How can we apply?
Can we convert our First and Second Shift Diploma Courses into Degree
Courses?
We are having UG and PG Courses in Engineering and Technology. How can we
convert our Courses into Diploma Level?
We want to apply for reduction in Intake within a Division for certain Courses.
What is the maximum number of UG and PG Courses, we can opt for reduction?
Can we apply for reduction in Intake in Second Shift Course within a Division?
Can we apply for expansion/increase in Intake in Second Shift Course(s) with
NBA Accredited courses?
The Institution has been placed under 20% reduction for 2017-18. How to get the
restoration of the reduced Intake in 2018-19?
Our Institution got approval upto the Academic Year 2015-16 and we were
unable to submit application in the years 2016-17and 2017-18. We want to apply
We are running an Engineering Course and taken approval from AICTE for the
Courses in 2011-12. After that we could not take extension of approval from
AICTE due to some reasons. Now we want to take extension of approval in year
2018-19. We have ID and password allotted by AICTE in 2011. Should we
continue to fill online application on Web Portal of AICTE using that ID and
Password?
Our Institution was given Withdrawal of Approval in 2017-18. We are not able to
create 2018-19 application
Our Institution was placed under No admission category in the previous year
(2017- 18). What we have to do for getting approval for the2018-19?
Our Institution was placed under Reduction in Intake with EoA category in the
previous year. We What we have to do for getting approval for the 2018-19?
We are not able to fill online Application for EoA for 2018-19. The status of EoA
shows 2017-18 open. Please enable the Institution for filling online application for
EoA for 2018-19.
We are an existing Institution and wish to apply for new Programme (Engineering
and Technology/Architecture/ Planning/ Management / Pharmacy/ HMCT/
MCA/Arts and Crafts)in the existing Institution
We are an Engineering Institution started in 2011-12 with Intake of 300 seats. We
want to start MBA and MCA Courses in the same Institution with same ID. What
is the procedure?
We have unused User ID and password obtained prior to 2017-18. Can we use
the same for applying for starting new Institution under Chapter I?
We want to apply for Conversion of Women’s Institution into Co-Ed Institution or
and Change of Site under Chapter I and also for increase in Intake/addition of
new Courses under Chapter II. Can we apply for all these together and how the
application will be processed?
We have an existing Technical Institution and wish to apply for new Technical
Institution in the same Campus/Site/Plot. Will the EVC conducted for all existing
Institutions including proposed new Institution?
In a State, if one University is merged with another University by Act of the State
Government, how to change the name of the affiliating University under Course
Tab.
Name of our affiliating University does not appear in the affiliating University
dropdown.
Is Integrated M.E./M.Tech Programme permitted?
Our Institution wants to change Name of the Course. What is the procedure?
When we have established our Institution in 1980, we have got the Completion
Certificate issued by the then Competent Authority, but we don’t have Occupancy
Certificate for 2017. How can we apply for EoA?
We have One Course with valid NBA accreditation. How many increase/new
Course our Institution is eligible?
We have Two Courses with valid NBA accreditation. How many increase/New
Courses our Institution is eligible?
We have Three Courses with valid NBA accreditation. How many increase/New
Courses our Institution is eligible?
We have Four or more Courses with valid NBA accreditation. How many
increase/new Course our Institution is eligible?
Our Institution is eligible to apply for NBA accreditation but does not applied for
getting NBA accreditation for the Courses. Can we apply for new/expansion
Courses?
We have started UG Course in pharmacy in 2009. Now we want to increase in
Intake for our B.Pharm. Course and addition of PG Course in pharmacy. We do
not have NBA accreditation. Whether we can add a new Course?
Our Institution has valid NBA accredited Courses. Is it necessary to upload valid
NBA letter on portal and send hardcopy to Regional Office?
Our Institution has applied for NBA, whether we are eligible for adding a new
Course?
My Institution has obtained Provisional Accreditation for two Courses which are
valid till 2017. I have used these Courses for adding two new Courses during
2016- 17. If my Institution secures accreditation again during 2018 for the same
Courses, can I apply for the introduction of New Course/ increase in Intake using
it.
Our Institution wants to apply for 2nd Shift/Part Time Courses and we are NBA
accredited/Not eligible for applying NBA accreditation Institution. How can we
apply?
Our Institution is not eligible to apply for NBA accreditation. But we want
expansion/new Courses how we can apply?
Our Engineering College started in 2013. Could you kindly help with the
information on applying for new Courses?
Our Institution is set up in 2013 as a standalone Management Institution, Offering
PGDM Course and we have added a Course (MBA) in the year 2014 and as
such we are not eligible for accreditation. How can we add a Course?
Our Institution is not eligible to apply for NBA accreditation and we have 5
Courses with total Intake of 300. Can we start a new Course by closing one
existing Course?
We are running a private Polytechnic Institution (3 years) from last year. Now we
want to Increase in Intake/Expansion in seats and branch in our running
Institution, currently we are running 5 branches with 300 Intake. How many
branches we can add? How many seats we can Increase?
We have approved Intake of 60 seats in Electronics and Communication
Engineering in UG Course. Now we want to reduce the Intake by 30 in
Electronics and Communication Engineering and in lieu of it can we would like to
add the one Division of 30 students in lateral entry in Engineering UG Course
Our Institution has Six UG Courses. How many seminar halls we need for
running UG Programme?
Our Institution wants to make admission under lateral entry facility for
Engineering and Technology (UG and Diploma Level), Pharmacy and MCA
Courses. Is there any provision in APH 2018-19?
Our Institution has two Divisions in MBA programme with Intake of 60 and 30
seats, now can we apply for increase in Intake of Second Division from 30 to 60
Intake without NBA accreditation?
We are running Five PG Courses in Civil Engineering. How many Professors with
Ph.D. qualification are required?
My Institution is approved by AICTE to run B.Pharm. and is also offering
Pharm.D. Course approved by PCI. How to apply to AICTE for its approval?
With reference to APH 2018-19, whether subscription of e-journal is mandatory.
I would like to know, whether a Deemed to be University/State Private Technical
University is required to take approval of AICTE to conduct technical Courses
How a State Private Technical University/Deemed to be University can apply to
take approval of AICTE to conduct technical Courses.
I would like to know, whether a Deemed to be University / State Private Technical
University having AICTE Approval till 2016-17 as an AICTE Approved institution
can use the old Login Credentials to take approval of AICTE now for the
University (now)to conduct technical Courses.
We are Deemed to be University/State Public University with three
Campuses/Constituent Colleges at different locations. Can we apply with
common Login Credentials to take AICTE Approval for the Programs/Courses
running in all three Campuses/Constituent Colleges?
We are currently running Diploma in Pharmacy and we want to apply Degree
Course in Pharmacy. Can we share the Laboratories and Faculty with the
Diploma in Pharmacy?
Please clarify the qualification and age limit of Adjunct faculty. Whether a same
Adjunct faculty can be associated with different Institutions? Is there any
Maximum no of Institutions that an Adjunct faculty should be associated?
Is it possible to merge standalone MBA programme with the Engineering
Institution of the same trust?
Can we merge Production Engineering Course of Intake 60 with Mechanical
Engineering Course of Intake 60 to offer a single Course in Mechanical
Engineering of Intake 120, under major discipline of Mechanical Engineering?
We have Three Divisions in Computer Science Engineering and Three Divisions
in Information Technology. Can we get Three Divisions after merging?
We have Three Divisions in Information Technology. Can we merge Two
Divisions of it with Computer Science, retaining One Division in Information
Technology?
Can we merge B.E. Electrical Engineering Course with B.E. Computer Science
Engineering Course?
Our Institution was approved as a Private / Un-aided Institution. Recently our
Institution has been recognized as minority Institution. How to change the status
in AICTE?
Whether MCA/MBA Department of Arts and Science College is eligible to apply
for AICTE approval?
Whether University Departments can apply for AICTE approval?
Our Institution is approved for the Academic Year 2017-18. However, we are
unable to take printout of EoA. How can this be rectified?
We have got EoA for 2017-18 and subsequently we have got the approval for
change in name of the Affiliating University, but it is not reflecting in the EoA.
How to apply for 2nd Shift/ Part Time / Dual Degree Programme?
Is it essential to have representative of AICTE in the Board of Governors?
Do we need Research Laboratory for each PG Programme?
Can we charge the fee as per the Recommendation of National Fee Committee
given in APH?
How much is the Development Fee is recommended by the National Fee
Committee?
Whether our Institution can start ITI with same infrastructure available in our
Polytechnic?
Whether Lateral Entry is permitted in Diploma?
How can an Institution apply for National Digital Library?
What is National Academic Depository? How to apply?
What is Food and Safety Act 2006? How to comply with its norms?
Whether Supernumerary Seats are permissible for B.Pharm. Course?
Why an applicant for New Technical Institution should refer Perspective Plan?
Ours is a Deemed to be University/Private University established under UGC Act
offering Technical Programmes but not seeking approval from AICTE. What is the
procedure for getting the programmes approved by AICTE during 2018-19?
Our University is 07 years old Private University approved by UGC. Whether
Private University running technical Programmes/ Courses in Engineering,
Management, Architecture, MCA, etc. are required to obtain AICTE approval?
My Institution is offering PGDM Course. Can I convert the same to MBA with the
same Intake?
My Institution is offering Second Shift Courses in Engineering and Technology.
Can I convert it with the same Intake to First Shift Courses?
Is Adjunct Faculty being considered for the requisite Faculty Student ratio?
Is it necessary to provide details for Quality Education Mandate?
